title: Queue Time
body:
I've been waiting in queue for over 5 minutes... not typical in my ELO so I swapped from SR to ARAM and here I am at another 5 minute queue... is something not working?

EDIT:
At a 10 minute queue time now...

http://i.imgur.com/xqdIPIx.png

replies.body:
I am on an OCE server and I waited 20 minutes last night.
Approx was 1:32
Actual got to 20 minutes and I just gave up.

Takes longer to find a game than it does to win one...
Took to twitter and still not response, nearly 12 hours later.

Why is the queue times so messed up, can you give a way to fix it, or is this going to be fixed by an update?

Definitely not normal!  I was looking forward to a lunchtime ARAM game myself :( Our network ops dudes are currently looking into this though.  Can follow updates on our [Server Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page (or click the little exclamation point in the client, whichever works for you)

Thanks for the response, I'm monitoring via the ! to see when I might have another free moment to queue.

Those ops guys always seem awesome so hopefully it's resolved soon :)
This is for a Bot game with a 5 man group.. [Gyazo pic](https://gyazo.com/9487742749fbc91e7b001228f73210b7)
Having same problem.  This also happened last patch.
Queued for 30 mins. sadly my lunch break is now too close to over so no aram for lunch. boo.

Finally - we have contact from Rito -
http://i.imgur.com/E5ZbNa1.png
I've been in ARAM queue for over 20 minutes now. It's not just you.
Rip, I started me queue process at 12:05 PST, and tried swapping accounts and between SR and ARAM :( not ranked though... not sure what's going on

Something in 6.6 broke queue times. I'm seeing a lot of other people report this on the boards and on Reddit. Still no red response though; there's probably a hotfix on the way. Last time something like this happened they were on it like ugly on a pig.
Well I will be officially out of time to play a match during lunch :(
Same here for me too. waited 10+ min in every queue minus ranked and got nothing.
I've been trying to join a normal blind pick SR for over 10 minutes. What is going on????
Same issue here, Ranked seems to work fine but i'm at 5 min wait for ARAM.
